item.title: Tis the season to be... cryogenically frozen?
item.author: Felix Editor,Abigail Sawyer,
item.description: For starters, here’s a myth buster: Walt Disney was not actually cryogenically frozen. With news emerging this week concerning a terminally ill 14-year-old girl winning a court case against her father allowing her to be cryogenically frozen, I decided to explore exactly what this entails. First of …
